pullrequest.title: Improve gpu laser and its sensor shutdown

content.raw: Mmmm… I tested it in Gazebo 9 with our classic box and lidar setup before and there was no SIGSEGV… But the test was without these changes, so maybe it was there but the issue didn’t appear until the object was properly destroyed. The issue seems to be related to the Connection destructor.   I am testing this again.
content.html: Mmmm… I tested it in Gazebo 9 with our classic box and lidar setup before and there was no SIGSEGV… But the test was without these changes, so maybe it was there but the issue didn’t appear until the object was properly destroyed. The issue seems to be related to the Connection destructor. I am testing this again.
